rt.integrators

Class DebugIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.integrators.DebugIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Integrator

    public class DebugIntegrator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Integrator
    Use this integrator for debugging purposes. For example, you can simply return a white spectrum if the ray hits something, and black otherwise. Any other visualization of data associated with a hit record may be useful.

      • makePixelSamples

        public float[][] makePixelSamples(Sampler sampler,
                         int n)
        Make sample budget for a pixel. Since this integrator only samples the 2D pixel area itself, the samples are 2D.
        Specified by:
        makePixelSamples in interface Integrator
        Parameters:
        sampler - the sampler to be usef for generating the samples
        n - the desired number of samples
        Returns:
        the array of samples
